plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me.
🥕 I am often orange, but can be other colors.

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?
I am red and juicy. You can eat me off a plant. What am I?
I am a pretty flower with lots of colors. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 Bees make honey after visiting me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to crack me open.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. You can make pickles out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am a type of vegetable.
🥗 I am often used in salads.

plant.question: I am a small, round, red fruit that grows on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used in sauces.
🇮🇹 I am important in Italian cooking.

plant.question: I grow underground and have brown skin. You can bake me and make french fries. What am I?
I am a tall plant with a hard trunk and branches that reach to the sky. I am home to many birds and squirrels. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I lose my leaves in the Fall
🦉 I can live for many years
🧱 Houses are built from my wood

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows in fields. You can eat my yellow kernels or pop them in a pot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow tall in the summer.
🍿 I turn into a yummy snack when heated.

food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys love to peel me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of sunshine!
🤔 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am red and round. You can bite into me or drink my juice! What am I?
I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. I'm yummy and sweet!

hints.text: 🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to munch on me!

hints.text: 🟠 I am the color of pumpkins.

food.question: I'm green and grow in bunches. Monkeys and people like to eat me!
I'm small and round and often used to make sauce for pasta! What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I can be red or yellow.
🌱 I am a fruit, but people think I am a vegetable!

food.question: I am made from milk. Sometimes I'm hard, sometimes I'm soft. You can put me on crackers!

hints.text: 🥛 Milk is used to make me.

food.question: I am long, and green, and crunchy, and you can dip me in ranch!
I am a sweet treat that is often baked for birthdays. I can have frosting and candles on top!

hints.text: 🎂 You get me on your birthday!
🕯️ You can blow out my candles.

food.question: I am a grain that can be popped into a tasty snack! You often eat me at the movies.

hints.text: 🍿 You can eat me in the cinema!
